why_this_matters: Code reviews often create destructive interference. Applying wave mechanics creates constructive feedback that amplifies learning and team harmony
scrape_method: Software engineering psychology + acoustic feedback theory + mentorship effectiveness studies + team communication research
raw_data_snippet: Positive reinforcement (constructive interference): amplify good patterns. Gentle correction (phase alignment): guide without destroying confidence. Constructive questioning (resonance building): match the developers frequency
replication_instruction: Start reviews with positive pattern recognition, use questioning that matches developer skill level, apply constructive interference to amplify strengths, use gentle phase correction for improvements
